html: .@ricky_martin and @NYCFirstLady at the Gracie Mansion. The Office of the Mayor proclaimed June 7th as “Ricky Martin Day” for his artistic legacy, commitment to ending human trafficking, and solidarity with Puerto Rico after the devastation of the hurricanes. #RMFpic.twitter.com/2HchzgSH0X
text:
.@ricky_martin and @NYCFirstLady at the Gracie Mansion. The Office of the Mayor proclaimed June 7th as
“Ricky Martin Day” for his artistic legacy, commitment to ending human trafficking, and solidarity with Puerto Rico after the devastation of the hurricanes. #RMFpic.twitter.com/2HchzgSH0X

html: .@ricky_martin y @NYCFirstLady ayer previo a recibir su proclama. La Oficina del Alcalde de Nueva York proclamó el 7 de Junio como el “Día de Ricky Martin” por su legado artístico, compromiso con erradicar la trata humana y su solidaridad con Puerto Rico. #RMFpic.twitter.com/TB7TBbBsCM
